gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 109, Bulls 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Bulls, 109-107. Dorian Finney-Smith recorded a team-high 21 points (5-9 3PM) for the Nets, while Mikal Bridges added 20 points and three assists in the victory. DeMar DeRozan (24 points, four assists) and Zach LaVine (24 points, seven rebounds, five assists) combined for 48 points for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Nets improve to 1-0 in East Group C play; 3-2 in the regular season, while the Bulls fall to 0-1 in East Group C play; 2-4 in the regular season.
